name: saas-bank-template
description: Template for deploying, managing, and tearing down SAAS BANK infrastructure using GitHub Actions, AWS, and Azure.

instructions: Clone this template using the 'Use this template' button on GitHub.
Run `setup.sh` to initialize the repository, branches, and environments.
Customize deployment scripts and workflows under `deployment/` and `sandbox/`.
Use `teardown.sh` to safely delete the repository and clean up local files.
